title: The Week of Oscar Thomas: Advisory Hero
summary: Throughout one week, Oscar Thomas, a retired advisor turned writer, discovers his superpowers, helping those in crisis while balancing his peaceful life.
summaryGerman: Während einer Woche entdeckt Oscar Thomas, ein pensionierter Berater, der zum Schriftsteller wurde, seine Superkräfte, indem er Menschen in Krisen hilft und gleichzeitig sein friedliches Leben balanciert.
summaryDutch: Gedurende één week ontdekt Oscar Thomas, een gepensioneerde adviseur die schrijver werd, zijn superkrachten door mensen in crisis te helpen terwijl hij zijn vredige leven in evenwicht houdt.
summaryFrench: Tout au long d'une semaine, Oscar Thomas, un conseiller à la retraite devenu écrivain, découvre ses superpouvoirs, aidant les personnes en crise tout en équilibrant sa vie paisible.

story.text: Oscar starts his week with an unexpected visit from a young couple seeking advice on their failing business. Using his persuasive powers, he helps them devise a strategic recovery plan.
Feeling motivated by the previous day's success, Oscar writes a blog post that goes viral, helping thousands with similar problems.
A mysterious figure approaches Oscar, revealing that his advice-giving ability is actually a superpower, grounded in deep empathy and understanding.
Testing his newfound powers, Oscar focuses on a community project, uniting his neighborhood to restore the local park.
As word spreads of his deeds, Oscar faces a dilemma: maintain his peaceful life or fully embrace his role as a superhero. He chooses a balanced approach, resuming his writing.
Oscar spends a quiet day at home, reflecting on his experiences and outlining his next novel, inspired by the week's adventures.
Oscar meets with the young couple again, glad to see their progress and happy to realize he can make a difference both as an advisor and a hero.

ending: Oscar Thomas closed his notebook with a smile, his heart full, knowing he had embraced both his quiet writing life and his powerful role as a superhero.
moral: Everyone has a superpower; often, it's just the extraordinary way we can help others.
